ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESTopN(@TopN) ESFIItem.GID AS GID, ESFIItem.Code AS Code, ESFIItem.Description AS Description, ESFIItem.ItemType AS ItemType, ESFIItem.ItemClass AS ItemClass, ESFIItem.AssemblyType AS AssemblyType FROM ESFIItem AS ESFIItem WHERE (ESFIItem.Inactive = 0) AND (ESEqual(ESFIItem.fCompanyCode, ##(ESCOMPANY))) AND (ESEqual(ESFIItem.ItemClass, @ItemClass1))
